name: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
description:
A simple puzzle game with 35 different blocks and a level editor. Share your levels and try out other people's levels!

Level editor commands:

  • Press a letter/number on your keyboard to select it
  • Hold left click to place letters
  • Hold right click to delete letters
  • Press ENTER to toggle test mode

All levels are set on a 31x17 grid

Share your levels here:

https://adriendittrick.itch.io/abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz/community
